short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Under the Vidhwa Pension, State government is giving pension to those women whose spouse has been died. Check Vidhwa Pension List

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vidhwa Pension Yojana has been started by the states of the country to benefit widow women. Various state governments of the country are providing financial assistance to the financially poor destitute widowed women of their state so that they can live their lives well. The scheme benefits only those eligible applicants who are living below the poverty line. From here you will get to know the process of applying, checking the status of the application and other information to get the benefits of this scheme.
